Title: Web - Display player historical stock price graph
Description:
### Why

**As a user** 
**I want ** to be able to view an individual player's historical price for given time horizons
**So that ** I can better analyze a player's stock trends and make more informed investing decisions 

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: No data points
Given I am on the player detail page/screen
When I arrive on this page/screen, the tab selected should be "2 weeks"
Then I should see a blank graph with TBD messaging, e.g. "No data points currently available"

Scenario: Single data point
Given I am on the player detail page/screen
When I arrive on this page/screen, the tab selected should be "2 weeks"
Then I should be able to see a flat line of the single stock price

Scenario: 2 week horizon, market open
Given I am on the player detail page/screen
When I arrive on this page/screen, the tab selected should be "2 weeks"
And the market is currently open
Then I should be able to view a 2 week graph of the player's stock price, which has single data points for historical days (closing price of historical day's trading), and is appended with the best intra-day bid price as that value changes

Scenario: 2 week horizon, market closed
Given I am on the player detail page/screen
When I arrive on this page/screen, the tab selected should be "2 weeks"
And the market is currently closed
Then I should be able to view a 2 week graph of the player's stock price, which has single data points for historical days (closing price of historical day's trading)
```

**Notes:**

*Time horizons*
- 2 week
- 1 month
- 3 months
- 1 year
- All

Title: Web - Display 'Your Position' section if the user owns the playerg
Description:
### Why

**As a user**
**I want ** to be able to view general stats about my holdings of a given player
**So that ** I visualize market dynamics, profits, etc. in an easily digestible layout

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: Holding shares of given player
Given I hold shares in a given player 
When I view that player's detail screen 
Then I should be able to see the "Your Position" component, with the given stats:
* Shares
* Portfolio Diversity
* Average Cost
* Market Value
* Today's Return
* Total Return

Scenario: Not holding shares of given player
Given I do not hold shares in a given player 
When I view that player's detail screen 
Then I should only see the "General Stats" component for the player
```

**Notes:**


* Market value = # of shares * current bid price

* Portfolio diversity = (market value / total portfolio value)  100

* Avg cost = average purchase price per share (this value should be calculated and in the holding along w shares)

* Today's return = (current stock price - opening price) * shares

* Total return = (current stock price - avg cost) * shares

Title: Web - Use Search Bar to Filter by Player
Description:
### Why
**As** a user
**I want ** to be able to search for players by first of last name
**So that ** I can add players to my watchlist or view the player's detail screen in an efficient manner

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: All scenarios
Given I am in the "browse" tab of the app
When I click into the search bar
Then The default "Search Players" text should disappear 
And my keyboard should appear
When I type into the search bar
Then the of players that meet that search criteria should be dynamically rendered and filtered accordingly with each subsequent character
And I should see an "X" in the search tab 
And as the list appears, the player's image, name, team abbreviation, team logo, and icon to add the player to the watchlist should appear
When I click on the player's row
Then I should be taken to the player's detail page
Given I am searching for a player
When I click the "X" in the search tab
Then All search criteria would be deleted and the default Teams List would reappear 
```

**Notes:**
Search algorithm: characters types have to correspond with beginning of first name or last name (e.g. "Leb" would show "Lebron James", but "ebron" would not)

Further note: Watchlist functionality will be included in separate story

Title: Web - Create "Sell Market Order" Screen
Description:
### Why

**As** a user
**I want ** to be able to create a market order for LeagueStock player shares that I own and would like sell
**So that ** I can abide by the exchange rules and ensure that all orders I submit can be filled

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: Market Order less or equal to shares
Given I am a registered LeagueStock investor
And I have linked my bank account
When I attempt a market order purchase of shares of a specific player
And the total estimated cost of the transaction is less than my available LeagueStock funds
Then I should see a review screen 
```

**Notes:**
Market orders are really "pseudo" limit orders, in that they are submitted as limited orders with a limit price that is 5% higher than the market price

Title: Web - Validate Fund Availability for Limit/Market Orders
Labels: app, buy, mvp, payments & bank transfers, web
Description:
### Why

**As** a user
**I want ** to be able to trade LeagueStock player shares at total costs less than or equal to my available funds
**So that ** I can abide by the exchange rules and ensure that all orders I submit can be filled

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: Limit Order
Given I am a registered LeagueStock investor
And I have linked my bank account
When I attempt a limit order purchase of shares of a specific player
And the total estimated cost of the transaction is greater than my available LeagueStock funds
Then I should see a modal informing me that my transaction cannot be completed and more funds need to be allocated to my account
And I should be prohibited from completing the transaction

Scenario: Market Order
Given I am a registered LeagueStock investor
And I have linked my bank account
When I attempt a market order purchase of shares of a specific player
And the total estimated cost of the transaction is greater than my available LeagueStock funds
Then I should see a modal informing me that my transaction cannot be completed and more funds need to be allocated to my account
And I should be prohibited from completing the transaction
```

**Notes:**
Market orders are really "pseudo" limit orders, in that they are submitted as limited orders with a limit price that is 5% higher than the market price

Welcome to LeagueStock!

1. Tap on the image above to reveal your free stock.

then...

Title: Web - Update Landing screen with 4 cards with images and copy
Description:
Update Landing screen with 4 cards with images and copy.

Copy:
1. Your Passion. Your Profit.
LeagueStock empowers you to test and grow your knowledge and passion for sports — and turn it into personal profit.

2. Buy Low. Sell High.
LeagueStock works like the stock market, but you invest in athletes. Like professional sports agents and general managers, your love of the game can translate to earnings.

3.Know More. Earn More.
The guaranteed value for each share is based on a player's performance index, which is rooted in real-world game statistics. The better an athlete does, the more their performance index grows.

4. Get In. Get Rewarded.
After you join LeagueStock, we'll throw in one surprise stock for free. Yes, this one's on us!

See attached designs including artifacts. Make sure to also replace the 1st image (there was a slight change).

Description:
Display 2 lines on player detail graph with option below graph to toggle stock price, performance value, or both.

Performance Index - dailyIndexHistory collection within player - show on graph as dotted grey line

Stock Price - dailyTransactionHistory collection within player - show on graph as solid green line

Combined Graph - show both lines, all of dailyTransactionHistory and dailyIndexHistory.sublist(dailyIndexHistory.size() - dailyTransactionHistory.size(), dailyIndexHistory.size())


Show current player price as large green price on player detail above graph. Show “Performance Index | $99.99” with info button below player price.

Title: Web - Update "Current Player Price" and Performance Index above graph when graph clicked
Labels: app, player detail graph v2, web
Description:
When a user on the player detail page clicks on a point on the graph, update "Current Player Price" and Performance Index values above graph for the corresponding stock price and performance index on that day, and display the date.

Notes: 

Performance index only graph - 
* Large Green price will be the performance index value where the user clicked.
* Delta value on second line will be difference between zero index value and the performance index value where the user clicked.
* The performance index 3 lines will stay as current performance index .
* How to calculate click index in the array for performance index (x-axis is games) -
```
//graphButton.getGames() = number of games shown on graph when clicked
int index = performanceIndexValues.size() - graphButton.getGames() + indexFromGraphCallback;
```

Stock Price only graph - 
* Large Green price will be the Stock Price value where the user clicked.
* Delta value on second line will be difference between zero index stock price and the stock price where the user clicked.
* The performance index 3 lines will stay as current performance index .
* How to calculate click index in the array for stock price (x-axis is days) -
```
//graphButton.getDays() = number of days shown on graph when clicked
int index = stockPriceValues.size() - graphButton.getDays() + indexFromGraphCallback;
```

Combined graph - 
Stock Price only graph - 
* Large Green price will be the Stock Price value where the user clicked.
* Delta value on second line will be difference between zero index stock price and the stock price where the user clicked.
* The performance index 3 lines will change to the performance index value where the user clicked .
* How to calculate click index in the array for stock price (x-axis is days) -
```
//graphButton.getDays() = number of days shown on graph when clicked
int index = stockPriceValues.size() - graphButton.getDays() + indexFromGraphCallback;
```

See attached design

Title: Web - Display intra-day player stock price
Description:
### Why

**As a user** 
**I want ** to be able to view an individual player's historical price for the intra-day, market open trading period (of current, market open trades, or previous day's, if market has yet to open)
**So that ** I can better analyze a player's stock trends and make more informed investing decisions 

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: Current day market is open
Given I am on the player detail page/screen
When I arrive on this page/screen and click the "1 Day" tab
Then I should see a graphical record of all the current day's intra-market trades as the best bid price for that given player

Scenario: Current day market is closed 
Given I am on the player detail page/screen
When I arrive on this page/screen and click the "1 Day" tab
Then I should see a graphical record of all the most recent trading day's intra-market trades as the best bid price for that given player
```

Title: Web - Add Responsible Play to Disclosure Section
Description:
Create the sub screens for the Disclosures, including: About, Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy. See Designs. They are amazing. (Hard code for now, will be updated remotely in the future.)

Link to theleaguestock.com

Text:

The following provides information regarding the measures LeagueStock, LLC (“LeagueStock,” “we,” “us,” or “our”) has put in place in order to ensure a fair, safe, and responsible gaming environment:
Self-Exclusion

You may voluntarily self-exclude yourself from accessing the Website and Services at any time. You may ask for your account to be closed or restricted by emailing us at info@theleauguestock.com. By voluntarily self-excluding, you agree to provide full and accurate personal details, now and in the future, so as to allow access to, and/or use of, our Services to be restricted. If you choose to self-exclude, we will use all reasonable endeavors to ensure we comply with your self-exclusion. However, in agreeing to self-exclude you accept that you have a parallel undertaking not to attempt to circumvent voluntary self-exclusion. Accordingly, we have no responsibility or liability for any subsequent consequences or losses, howsoever caused, that you may suffer or incur if you commence or continue to access or make use of the Website through additional online accounts in circumstances where you have changed any of the registration details or you provide misleading, inaccurate or incomplete details or otherwise seek to circumvent the voluntary self-exclusion to which you agreed.

During a period of self-exclusion, we will use reasonable efforts to not send you any marketing material and we will not accept any deposits or entries from you. During a period of self-exclusion, you may not open a new account. We will not reopen any self-excluded account; however, after the expiry of the exclusion period you may contact us and ask for your account to be reopened
Self-Limitation

LeagueStock provides you the option to set daily, weekly, or monthly deposit limitations. You may lower a limit at any time by contacting us at info@theleauguestock.com. This election, to lower your deposit limit, will take effect thereafter. You may request the previous limit set limit to be increased or removed. Self-limitation is in addition to the limitations imposed by LeagueStock in accordance with applicable law(s).
Problem Gaming Resources

LeagueStock encourages responsible gameplay. LeagueStock will never induce or encourage players to play beyond their limits or chase losses. Problem gaming may result in financial hardship. If you feel you have an excessive gaming problem, we urge you to seek assistance. Excessive gaming warning signs include:

    Playing more in order to recoup or chase previous losses.

    Sacrificing time from family or work in order to participate in contests.

    Repeated inability to stop or control participation.

    Borrowing money to participate or to pay off previous losses.

    Lying or not being truthful about time or money lost to playing.

    Selling or pawning personal property to play.

    Feelings of hopelessness, depression, or suicide.

If you or someone you know is or may be experiencing a compulsive-play problem, it is important to remember that assistance, intervention, and treatment is available. Resources that are committed to providing professional and compassionate service to all interested persons include:

    Call: 1.800-426-2537 or access www.800gambler.org

    Call: 1.800-522-4700 National Council on Problem Gambling or access www.ncpgambling.org

Additional problem gaming resources may be available in your jurisdiction. If you have any questions or require assistance in providing you with appropriate support in your area, please contact us at info@theleauguestock.com.
Parental Controls

LeagueStock does not permit users under the age of 18 (or higher in certain jurisdictions) to register an account to access the Website or Services. In the event you believe a user is under the age of majority or is abusing the Website or Services, please contact us at info@theleauguestock.com.

Title: Web - Display Player Performance Index Information
Labels: app, player detail, player index value, web
Description:
### Why

**As** a user
**I want ** to be able to read more about LeagueStock's proprietary player index value concept
**So that ** I can make better informed trading decisions

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: Clicking info icon
Given I am on a player detail page
When I click the info icon next to "Performance Index"
Then I should see the explanatory information page as it relates to the performance index
And the page should arise from the bottom 

Scenario: Close information modal
Given I am viewing the informational page explaining the performance index
When I click the "exit" button
Then the modal/page should slide down and I should return to the player detail page
```

**Notes:**

Copy:

Player Performance Index

The Player Performance Index represents LeagueStock's assessment of an athlete's value and the guaranteed value for each share. 
Based on objective, real-world game statistics —like points, rebounds, blocks and assists—an athlete's index will increase if that athlete outperforms both their peers and their own past performance. 
The Player Performance Index is displayed as a dotted line on a player's profile.

Got it!

Title: Web - Create User Settings Screen
Description:
### Why


**As user**
**I want ** update my settings
**So that ** i can change my notification and security settings.

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: when im on the more screen 
Given
When i click on settings
Then i am able to change my settings. when updating text messages and dont have a phone number a popup will be displayed to show the user the option to go to my account to add a phone number. Push notifications need to be enabled but text and email should be turned on by default.
```

Title: Web - Display Player Search Bar & Teams List
Description:
### Why
**As** a user
**I want ** to be able to search for players
**So that ** I can add players to my watchlist, compare teammates, or view the player's detail screen in an efficient manner

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: All scenarios
Given I am anywhere within the LeagueStock app
When I click on the magnifying glass icon in the tab bar
Then I should see a screen with a search bar with default text "Search Players"
And A list of teams, underneath the "Search by Teams" header, listed alphabetically team name 
```

**Notes:**
No search functionality in this story; purely UI
Firebase functionality may already exist

Title: Web - Team Pages with Player List (Listed Alphabetically by last name)
Description:
### Why
**As** a user
**I want ** to be able to search for players by team
**So that **I can compare players by price or day's percentage change and view the player's detail screen in an efficient manner

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: All scenarios
Given I am in the "browse" tab of the app
When I select one of the teams listed under "Search by Team"
Then I should be brought to a new "sub page" that lists all players of a particular team, alphabetically by last name
And I should see a "Back" arrow to return me to the previous "Browse" page
And The header label should reflect the team name I have currently chosen
And the list should include each player's image, name, and a toggle for price or day percentage change
Given The toggle is set to "Price"
When I click on the toggle 
Then All players in the list should switch to the day's percentage change (and vice versa)
And when I click on the player row 
Then I should be taken to the player's detail page
```


**Notes:**
Separate story for global preferences re: price vs. percentage change, etc.

Title: Web - Add Funds using Linked accounts - UI
Description:
### Why

**As a user**
**I want ** to be able to add funds to my LeagueStock account from my linked bank account
**So that ** I can buy and sell shares of players

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: UI only 
Given I have linked bank accounts
When I click "Add Funds" on the "Transfers" screen or "LeagueStock Cash" on the home screen
Then I should be directed to the add funds screen and follow the flow listed in the designs below 
And I should see the confirmation screen when complete
``` 

**Notes:**
Amount transferring should be chosen, and bank accounts from which funds are being transferred should be selectable

Title: Web - Withdrawal Funds using Linked accounts - UI
Description:
### Why

**As a user**
**I want ** to be able to withdraw funds from my LeagueStock account to my linked bank account
**So that ** I can capitalize on those gainz

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: UI only 
Given I have linked bank accounts
When I click "Withdraw Funds" on the "Transfers" screen
Then I should be directed to the withdraw funds screen and follow the flow listed in the designs below 
And I should see the confirmation screen when complete
``` 

**Notes:**
* Amount transferring should be chosen, and bank accounts to which funds are being transferred should be selectable. 
* $ amount of withdraw-able cash (funds that are not currently vested or in "escrow" due to pending orders) should be visible

Title: Web - Unlink Bank Account(s)
Labels: app, mvp, payments & bank transfers, web
Description:
### Why

**As** a user
**I want ** to unlink my bank account
**So that ** I can add a different bank account and/or my current bank account is no longer active 

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Given I want to unlink my bank account and I have no LeagueStock cash
When I travel to the "transfers" page
And I click the "unlink" button (or equivalent)
Then I should see that my account is no longer linked

Given I want to unlink my bank account 
And I have LeagueStock cash, holdings, or a pending order (and have only one bank account linked)
When I travel to the "transfers" page
And I click the "unlink" button (or equivalent)
Then I should see appropriate "warning" or informational messaging about unlinking accounts
When I confirm the messaging and proceed
Then I should see that my account is no longer linked
```

**Notes:**
This will be done using Plaid/Stripe integration. A "backend" Plaid service will have to be configured in GCP to retrieve the Plaid token. Please discuss more with Sumit.

Title: Web -Link Investor's Bank Account(s)
Description:
### Why

**As** a user
**I want ** to verify my bank account
**So that ** I can eventually transfer funds to my LeagueStock account and invest in players with those funds 

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: Initial registration
Given I am a new LeagueStock user
When I complete my registration process
And I have verified my email  
Then I should be prompted with a modal to link/verify my bank account (via the Transfers" or "Link Account" page)
And I should be prompted with a 3rd party vendor web view to link my bank account
And Once my bank account is linked/verified, I should be able to view it in the "Transfers" tab

Scenario: Post-registration
Given I am a new (or existing) LeagueStock user and I haven't yet linked my bank account
When I am on the dashboard 
And I have verified my email
Then I should be able to click on "LeagueStock cash" 
Or I should be able to click on "More -> Transfers" or "Link Account"
And I should be prompted with a modal to link/verify my bank account
And I should be prompted with a 3rd party vendor web view to link my bank account
And Once my bank account is linked/verified, I should be able to view it in the "Transfers" tab
```

**Notes:**
This will be done using Plaid/Stripe integration. A "backend" Plaid service will have to be configured in GCP to retrieve the Plaid token. Please discuss more with Sumit.

Title: Web - "Lock Up" Funds While Orders Are Pending
Labels: app, buy, mvp, payments & bank transfers, web
Description:
### Why

**As** a user
**I want ** to ensure that I have enough LeagueStock cash to ensure pending orders can be filled
**So that ** I can effectively use the platform and orders can be filled according to platform rules

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario: Attempt to Purchase additional shares
Given I am a LeagueStock investor
And I have placed a buy order (limit or market) that has yet to be filled
When I attempt to purchase shares of a given player
Then my "available LeagueStock cash" amount should reflect the reduced amount of the pending order total
```

**Notes:**
